naturally_trimmed.config.enable_features: Enables the Loot Table trimming feature
Enables the Villager Trade Trimming feature
Settings for trimming items generated by loot tables
Chance of an item generated by a loot table of having a trim applied
naturally_trimmed.config.trimTrades.trim: Chance of a trade of having a trim applied
naturally_trimmed.config.trimTrades.minL: The minimum villager trading level a item needs to be in, to have a chance of being trimmed
naturally_trimmed.config.trimMobs.toolti: Settings for trimming a mobs equipment
naturally_trimmed.config.trimMobs.trimSy:
Select the System of how to select, what trims to give mobs.
- Random Trims: Randomly choose the trim, but also take the previous trim highly into account.
- Custom Trims: Choose the trim out of a list of custom trims. You can manage the trims yourself
naturally_trimmed.config.trimMobs.noTrim: Chance of the mob having no trims at all
naturally_trimmed.config.trimMobs.random:
Settings for the Random Trims System.
These settings will only make a difference, if the random trims system is enabled.
Chance of each armor piece of a mob having an armor trim
Chance of each armor piece having a similar armor trim as the previous armor piece
naturally_trimmed.config.blacklist.descr:
This is a blacklist for disabling trim patterns.

Regex is used, which helps reducing a lot of repetition.
This also means, if you want to check for a specific pattern, you need to use "^[pattern]$" instead of just "[pattern]"

By default, all patterns from the Trimmable Tools mod are blacklisted, since they only work for tools and not armor
naturally_trimmed.config.utils.tooltip: Multiple utility buttons to make configuring the mod easier
naturally_trimmed.config.utils.reloadCon:
Reload the config from the config file.
Useful for configuring the Custom Trims Combination system, since it is only configurable through the config file
naturally_trimmed.config.utils.validateC:
Validates the Custom Trim Combinations and logs each invalid combination in chat.
Only works while inside a world
naturally_trimmed.config.utils.validateB:
Validates the Trim Blacklist and logs every blacklisted trim pattern, every non-blacklisted trim pattern and every unnecessary blacklist entry in chat.
Only works while inside a world
naturally_trimmed.config.backup_screen.i: Install Yet Another Config Lib to access the config screen
